data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Math::Fractal::Curve makes it very simple to generate fractal
    curves from simple generator functions (such as the von Koch "snow"
    curve or Cantor sets, etc.). There is no other module on CPAN that
    does this.

    Math::Fractal::DLA has a totally different approach to creating
    quasi-fractal structures and Math::Fractal::Curve does not comply
    with the Math::Fractal::DLA interface, so it does not belong into
    the Math::Fractal::DLA hierarchy.
